page.title: 09THE LIFE OF A LOLLIPOP LADY
page.content: {For the past 18 years,Mrs.Annie Noble, of Deanhurst Gardens,Gildersome has been the school crossing patrol lady for Gildersome Junior School.Her work began supervising children across Town St.outside the Grove Nursery. {"My children moved away and I got bored so I decided to take the job. When I started there was no junior school until 1969 and that burned down in 1978.The one that is up now was built in 1981,"she said. {Mrs.Noble was born in Drighlington.She moved to Gildersome aged 3,attended Street Lane School leaving school at 14 to go straight into textile work at Drighlington Mill. {"There were no lollipop ladies in my childhood,"she said. {Lollipop ladies were officially intro- duced in 1953 and are employed by the West Yorkshire Police.
